DOC.brief_summary: An efficient protocol ovarian stimulation key part assist reproductive technology . In order obtain high oocyte retrieval adverse effect , numerous study evaluate efficiency clinical approach currently available . Recent study show two natural compound , inositol melatonin , play important role oocyte maturation quality . Therefore , present study aim investigate whether inositol melatonin able improve number oocyte obtain ovarian stimulation Recombinant Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( rFSH ) . To purpose , randomize double-blind trial establish 150 healthy woman reproductive age undergo assistant reproductive technology ( ART ) male infertility divide two group . Group A treat 225IU rFSH alone , group B treat 225IU rFSH , 4g inositol 3mg melatonin . As primary outcome study , oocyte quality , total number oocyte retrieve , clinical pregnancy rate live birth rate evaluate group A vs. group B .
DOC.criteria: Female age 1839 year BMI 1830 kg/m2 , Fewer 3 prior oocyte retrieval , No fertility Problems
